description.name: eurcavaxc
description.tagline: EURC avax-c Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto avax-c-eurc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept EURC avax-c directly on your website
Unique avax-c/eurc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your avax-c/eurc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
